scripts.ios-bundle: react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --platform ios --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/res
scripts.android-bundle: react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --platform android --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.clear-cache: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm start -- --reset-cache
